overview:
Albert Montano has worked in the venture capital arena since 1974 and is currently an entrepreneur venture capitalist. He previously was the founder and CEO of Ventana Financial Resources. Ventana provided financial management consulting services and specialized in raising capital for start-ups as well as early stage companies. He began his business career at Baxter Healthcare where he was a product development manager as well as a product manager. Over the years Albert was associated with numerous companies in various capacities including Trancept, Ltd., SenreQ, L.L.C., Alto Automotive, Permian Basin Corp. and Nessa L.L.C.

Albert has evaluated hundreds of business opportunities over his career and has developed a keen insight into potentially viable and profitable ventures. It is because of his belief that the eMusea core concept is a solid one that he partnered with Shneider to implement it.

relationships.title: Co-Founder & EVP & Board of Directors & Shareholder
